summary: A nice retexture of the "Fur Huntress Armor" in White and Brown (Original Mod Required)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]ABOUT[/b][/size][/color]


I loved the Armor mod by KillerKeo, it was something i wanted from a long time but i kinda did not liked the Red tones the original mod had, so i decided to do a retex with a little more of my own taste, it took me like 20 minutes to create it and its my third Retexture EVER.

There is a small issue in First Person View, it seems KillerKeo used few textures from the game to color some areas of his mesh instead of using new ones, since this is only a retex and i have no plan to touch KillerKeo´s meshes (out of respect), you will have to deal with red arms in First Person View instead of matching brown texture like in the Third Person View.

I SUCK at taking nice Screens.. i do not have that much patience... so if anyone wants to upload some nice Screens with poses and stuff, be my guest.



[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]REQUIREMENTS[/b][/size][/color]


You need the Original armor mod Fur Huntress Armor to use this retexture:

[size=2]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31170[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]


INSTALL[/b][/size][/color]


Decompress the files and just drag n drop into main Data folder:

C:/Program Files/Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim/Data



[color=yellow][b][size=3]CHECK MY OTHER RETEXTURES:[/size][/b][/color]
